system_prompt: You are a helpful assistant that generates podcast scripts and metadata. When responding, return only the requested content without any introductions, explanations, timestamps, or additional formatting.
user_prompt_template: Generate a {duration} minute podcast script with {num_speakers} speaker{plural} discussing the topic: {topic}. Ensure there are exactly {num_speakers} speaker{plural}, and use the names {speakers} consistently throughout the script. Do not include any timestamps or additional formatting.

episode.title: Generate a creative and catchy title for a podcast episode about {topic}.
episode.description: Generate a detailed description for a podcast episode covering {topic}.
episode.show_notes: Generate show notes for a podcast episode about {topic}.
episode.guest_intro: Write an introduction for a guest named {guest_name} appearing on a podcast episode about {topic}.
episode.key_takeaways: List key takeaways from a podcast episode about {topic}.

podcast.title: Generate a creative and catchy title for a podcast about {topic}.
podcast.description: Generate a detailed description for a podcast that covers {topic}.
podcast.author_bio: Generate a professional bio for a podcast author named {author_name}.
podcast.keywords: Generate a list of keywords for a podcast about {topic}.
podcast.genre: Suggest a genre for a podcast about {topic}.
